Package it.polimi.se2018.network

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LocalProxyRMIInterface
    An interface to expose the server's methods to the client via RMI connection
    RemoteProxyRMIInterface
    An interface to expose client's methods to the server via RMI connection
    ServerInterface
    An interface to expose Server's methods to allow RMI clients to connect
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    The client class.
    LocalProxy
    A class that represents the remote client on the server side.
    LocalProxyRMI
    The LocalProxy, retained by the server.
    LocalProxySocket
    A class that represent a client connected via socket communication on the server.
    RemoteProxy
    A class that represents the server on the client side.
    RemoteProxyRMI
    The LocalProxy, retained by the client.
    RemoteProxySocket
    A class that represent a server connected via socket communication on the client.
    Server
    The entry point for the server.
